c-0: ^ You probably know Earth more than me...
^Ah, right. Earth's only moon. I remember you now.

new: ^Oh? We don't get many visitors. Though, I'm not surprised you found your way to me.
^Jupiiiiie! You're not gonna bring in another moon, are you?

g-0: ^Oh no you don't! Jupiter's got enough moons to make them happy, thank you very much!

main: ^What are you doing so far from Earth? You lost or something?
^I got lost exploring the Asteroid Belt.

c-0: ^ I'm uhh... looking for a new planet.

lost: ^Shouldn't you be with Earth though? How'd you get split from them?
main2: ^Well, we can't help you there, hun. Jupiter's so good to us!
^Jupiter flexes and shows off their Great Red Spot. The surrounding moons swoon.

c-0: ^ I think it looks really nice on you.
^Thanks... uh, that's just how I roll.
^Ah, so tough! Jupiter really has it all!
^Except room for more moons, so back off!
c-1: ^Ah, so tough! Jupiter really has it all!
^Except room for more moons, so back off!
c-2: ^Oh yeah, Earth's probably pretty stormy as well... sorry.
^Ah, forget about Earth! That prick has nothing on our Jupiter!
^But our Jupiter has enough moons already, so back off!
g-0: ^Hey, how about you back off? It's not like they even notice you!
^How about you BOTH back off! I'm their favorite-- right Jupie?
^... you should probably leave. This can get ugly fast...

JupiterSecond: ^Oh, hey Moon. Wasn't sure if you would come back.
^Well, I liked talking to you earlier, and...
^I want to get to know you better.
^I want to talk to some of your other moons.
^I just wanted to hang out with you.

c-0: ^ ... uh, I wanted to get to know you better.
^Me? Well, I'm the largest and oldest planet around here. I wanted to be a start at one point, but that didn't work out.
^ You can just... be a star?
^It's pretty complicated, but you need a lot of mass to start fusion reactions. I was big, but not dense enough.
^And you should've seen then 4 billion years ago!
c-1: ^ So... what do you do now?
^Not much, really. I guess I chill with Saturn and watch the Asteroid Belt.
^Not much? What about all those big rocks you hurl around?
^ ... uh, I wanted to chat with... your other moons?
^You wanted to talk to me, Jupie?
^Actually, Moon wanted to talk to you.
^Hey, I wanna talk to Moon too! What's up?
^How do you feel about Jupiter as a planet?
^Do you always fight over Jupiter like that?

c-0: ^... you know, I am still here...
^Jupiter's great! They may not always tell us, but they love each and every one of us.
^I've never felt safer than with Jupiter at my barycenter.
c-1: ^ So are you... um... do you always...

c-2: ^ ... uh, I want to just, hang out?
^Yeah, sure thing. You can chill with me.
^Waaaait a minute. I know what THAT means. You're trying to fall into my orbit again!
^YOUR orbit? Who thinks YOU get to take over the orbit?
^Do you always fight over Jupiter like that?

c-0: ^ So are you... um... do you always...
c-1: ^Could you not fight right now? We have a guest, after all.

fight: ^What? Oh hun, I'm so sorry! You must think we hate each other!
^... OK, Europa hates everyone. But the rest of us... I don't know.
^I think we just riled up sometimes. Orbiting such a strong planet can do that to a moon.
main: ^Toughest in the solar system! That's our Jupie!
^Hm? Oh, it's nothing. Nothing you need to worry about, at least.

c-0: ^ ... y'know, you don't always have to be tough. It's ok to express your emotions sometimes.
c-1: ^ Okay... well, if you need anything, I'm here for you.
g-0: ^That's really nice of you to say...
^You suddenly notice that Jupiter is starting to cry. They try to hide it, but you can hear them choking back sobs.
^AH! What did you do to them?
^I-I don't know what happened! We were just talking, and-- and...
